product_name: Sierra Designs Gnar Lite Down Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great under a shell on cold days or as an outer layer when temps are warmer, the Gnar Lite down jacket features DriDownTM so your down can stay out and play, even in the rain.
short_description: Great under a shell on cold days or as an outer layer when temps are warmer, the Gnar Lite down jacket features DriDownTM so your down can stay out and play, even in the rain.
